name: UrinaryCollectionAndIrrigationSystemDeviceOrSupply
title: Urinary Collection and Irrigation System Device or Supply
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Urinary collection and irrigation supplies or devices.),(Data Element Scope: Urinary collection and irrigation system supplies or devices categorized as durable medical equipment and supplies that may be used in support of urinary collection and irrigation  -  as defined by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Urinary collection and irrigation supplies.),(Exclusion Criteria: Durable medical equipment and supplies used for purposes other than urinary collection or irrigation or not required for review by Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.)

concept.display: Irrigation tray with bulb or piston syringe, any purpose
Therapeutic agent for urinary catheter irrigation
Irrigation syringe, bulb or piston, each
Insertion tray with drainage bag but without catheter
Irrigation tubing set for continuous bladder irrigation through a three-way indwelling foley catheter, each
Bedside drainage bag, day or night, with or without anti-reflux device, with or without tube, each
Urinary drainage bag, leg or abdomen, vinyl, with or without tube, with straps, each
Bedside drainage bottle with or without tubing, rigid or expandable, each
Urinary drainage bag, leg or abdomen, latex, with or without tube, with straps, each
